channel.title: Version 2.5 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 2.5.1 (2021-10-12) Fixes [bug] security: fix XSS fer malicious image URLs #117 2.5.0 (2021-10-08) Enhancements [feature][change] rules highlight: provide default colors fer unknown languages #113 Fixes [bug] security: fix XSS fer malicious URLs #114 [bug] menu: write correct local shortcut links #112
